mapper.sql: id, canal_code, start_year, end_year, watering_name, turn, total_days, start_month, start_day, end_month, end_day, start_day_time, end_day_time, river_come_water, last_turn_capacity, canal_decision_area, matching, reality_area, water_distribution_quota, water_auota_id, waterduty, soil_water_net_amount, soil_water_net_amount_ratio, soil_water_all_amount, need_reservoir_water_amount, life_water_amount, machine_water_amount, forest_water_amount, other_water_amount, own_turn_capacity, create_people, create_time, update_time, remark, comm1, comm2, comm3, comm4, comm5
mapper.select:
select
from water_plan_new where canal_code = #{canalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by start_year order by start_year desc

select distinct a.id, a.canal_code, a.start_year, a.end_year, a.watering_name, a.turn, a.total_days, a.start_month, a.start_day, a.end_month, a.end_day, a.start_day_time, a.end_day_time, a.river_come_water, a.last_turn_capacity, a.canal_decision_area, a.matching, a.reality_area, a.water_distribution_quota, a.water_auota_id, a.waterduty, a.soil_water_net_amount, a.soil_water_net_amount_ratio, a.soil_water_all_amount, a.need_reservoir_water_amount, a.life_water_amount, a.machine_water_amount, a.forest_water_amount, a.other_water_amount, a.own_turn_capacity, a.create_people, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.remark, a.comm1, a.comm2, a.comm3, a.comm4, a.comm5 from water_plan_new a inner join site_middle_canal b on a.water_auota_id = b.plan_new_code where b.canal_code = #{canalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by start_year desc

update water_plan_new
canal_code = #{canalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_year = #{startYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_year = #{endYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
watering_name = #{wateringName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
turn = #{turn,jdbcType=INTEGER},

end_day_time = #{endDayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
river_come_water = #{riverComeWater,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

other_water_amount = #{otherWaterAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
